alert.note: Alert for Benton; Polk (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 28 at 10:49AM PST until December 29 at 3:03PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Portland OR has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Oregon... Luckiamute River near Suver affecting Benton and Polk Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO TOMORROW AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Luckiamute River near Suver. * WHEN...From this afternoon to tomorrow afternoon. * IMPACTS...Above 27.0 feet, expect flooding of low lying and agricultural lands in the vicinity of Sarah Helmick State Park, Highway 99W, and Parker Road. Some secondary roads and rural access roads may be flooded at this point. Flooding along Buena Vista Rd near the confluence with the Willamette is also likely, especiallly if the Willamette is running high. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:11 AM PST Wednesday the stage was 26.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this afternoon to a crest of 27.5 feet late this evening. It will then fall below flood stage tomorrow morning. - Flood stage is 27.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. The next statement will be issued this afternoon at 430 PM PST.
